channel.title: 2017 on anurags blog
channel.description: Recent content in 2017 on anurags blog

item.title: 52 posts in 52 weeks (atleast)
item.description: I have been wanting to do this for a while - blog. And by a while, I mean for years now. I try, and then I am not so comfortable about it, and things come up, and I give up. It is easy to give up. There is no direct immediate cost to giving up. There are other, easier things to do. But why write? Why blog? Well because writing is a means of recording information.
